about_the_game:
A brand-new, flashy cyber-themed map arrives to SkyDive - Neon Island!

Take flight in an Asian city teeming with tall buildings under the guise of night. Streaked with neon lights, the map leads you to the city's dark alleys and its secluded corners that are waiting to be explored. As the name implies, the Neon Island adds its own personal touch to races in the form of neon gates, so take advantage of everything night has to offer!
detailed_description:
A brand-new, flashy cyber-themed map arrives to SkyDive - Neon Island!

Take flight in an Asian city teeming with tall buildings under the guise of night. Streaked with neon lights, the map leads you to the city's dark alleys and its secluded corners that are waiting to be explored. As the name implies, the Neon Island adds its own personal touch to races in the form of neon gates, so take advantage of everything night has to offer!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.

name: FPV.SkyDive - Neon Island

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.

short_description: Take flight in an Asian city filled with neon lights illuminating the city's darkest corners and explore everything the city has to offer - including the thematically-designed neon race gates!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
